Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string GetAutomationIdCore() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the string that uniquely identifies the that is associated with this . Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId%2A>.
Docs.returns: The automation identifier for the element associated with the , or <xref:System.String.Empty> if there isn't an automation identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of the automation identifier is the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A> property, and if that isn't set, it's the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string GetHelpTextCore() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the string that describes the functionality of the that is associated with this . Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText%2A>.
Docs.returns: The help text, usually from the , or <xref:System.String.Empty> if there is no help text.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string GetNameCore() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the text label of the that is associated with this . Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName%2A>.
Docs.returns: The text label of the element that is associated with this automation peer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The name property can be thought of as the string of text that a user would use to explain which control is being referred to. It is important to have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.
